meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Personnel
agenda_items.description: Interview Baker Tilly semifinalist candidates and discuss qualifications of the candidates and deliberate the appointment of the City Manager.

agenda_items.title: Consideration of City Manager Appointment
agenda_items.description: (1) qualifications and appointment of to the position of city manager; (2) adopting a resolution appointing as City Manager; (3) approving the terms of the Agreement of Appointment; and (4) authorizing the execution of the Agreement of Appointment of the city manager.

financial_items.description: Salary information is included in the Agreement of Appointment
